string_data:
Looking at my previous output, I need to make one correction. The phrase "the Oscars of oil" appears to be a characterization used by the protesters or their supporters to describe the Energy Intelligence Forum, which would make it part of their messaging. Let me correct this:

ID: Sun_2023-10-17_PROTEST-ARREST-Ecowarrior-Greta
Source: Sun
Title: #DS PROTEST ARREST Eco-warrior Greta Thunberg arrested after joining protest outside conference in London #DE
Content: #DS #PH #CS Greta Thunberg was arrested at a climate protest today (Alt: The image shows a young woman in a grey winter jacket and knit hat being escorted by two British police officers in high-visibility yellow jackets and checkered caps. She's wearing a blue shirt with text that appears to say ) #CE
THIS is the moment Greta Thunberg was hauled away by cops after she was arrested at a protest today.The eco-warrior had joined the demonstration at the five-star InterContinental Park Lane.She was pictured being led by away by Met Police officers following the protest against the Energy Intelligence Forum (EIF).The meeting, which brings together fossil fuel executives and government ministers, has been branded #MS "the Oscars of oil" #ME.Thunberg and dozens of other eco-zealots chanted #MS "oily money out" #ME and attempted to block access to the luxury hotel.
#PH #CS Thunberg joined protesters in a march against the Energy Intelligence Forum (Alt: The image shows a young woman with blonde hair wearing a gray knit beanie and puffy winter jacket, shouting with her mouth wide open and eyes closed. She's wearing what appears to be a shirt with text that includes ) #CE
Two Greenpeace eco-warriors abseiled down from the roof to unfurl a giant banner reading #MS "Make Big Oil Pay" #ME.Swedish activist Thunberg was detained with around ten other activists before being driven away in a police car.The Met confirmed six people were initially arrested on suspicion of obstructing a highway during the protest.A further 14 were detained on suspicion of disrupting public order, and one other person was arrested for criminal damage.
#PH #CS She was detained along with a number of other activists (Alt: The image shows a crowd of protesters in winter clothing gathered outdoors near buildings. In the foreground, a young woman wearing a grey knit beanie and light-colored winter jacket appears to be shouting or chanting. Behind her, other activists including someone with long dark hair are visible. Police officers in high-visibility yellow vests can be seen among the crowd, consistent with the arrest context mentioned in the caption.) #CE #DE
